data.name: CoH 2 - German Commander: Fortified Armor Doctrine
data.detailed_description:
GERMAN COMMANDER: FORTIFIED ARMOR DOCTRINE
Your vehicles can live longer and fight harder with better vision, recon, defensive options and the presence of a Command Tank.
  • ELEFANT TANK DESTROYER
    This heavy tank destroyer has a massive armor envelope and one of the most potent guns ever mounted on a fighting vehicle; the 88mm Pak43. Weighing 65 tons, the Elefant's weakness is manueverability.
  • COMMAND TANK
    A command tank that can improve nearby armored forces can be ordered from Support Armor Korps.
  • HULL DOWN
    Pioneers, Grenadiers and Panzer Grenadiers are able to set German armor in an immobile Hull Down position, increasing defense, accuracy and reducing reload times.
  • RECONNAISSANCE OVERFLIGHT
    Available aircraft will make a reconnaissance pass on the targeted location to reveal enemy forces.
  • PANZER TACTICIAN
    All armored vehicles use their equipped smoke dischargers to prevent themselves from being seen.
This DLC is already included in the Digital Collector’s Edition.

data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Polish*, Czech
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows Vista (32bit), Windows 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or Equivalent
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 20GB
  • Video Card: 256MB Direct3D 10 capable video card (GeForce 8800 or RadeonHD 2900)
  • Additional: Internet Connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 1.8Ghz Intel
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 512MB (Nvidia 6xx series or later, AMD 7xxx series or later and Intel Iris Pro).
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 2.4Ghz Intel
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB (Nvidia 780MX, AMD D700 or R9 295X)
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 2.6 GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 1GB*
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    *Requires an Intel Iris Pro graphics card or an NVIDIA 600 series graphics card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 3.4 GHz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent.
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB**
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    **NVIDIA 760 series card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
